channel.title: Schema, ontologies and templates on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Schema, ontologies and templates on open-archaeo

item.title: Alligator
item.description: A Web tool for converting CAs with dating information to relative time intervals as RDF.

item.title: Archaeo-Term
item.description: Multilingual glossary designed to enhance access to archaeological data.

item.title: archvocab
item.description: The ArchVocab ontologies by Leif Isaksen

item.title: ARCSCore
item.description: ARCSCore is a metadata standard for organizing and sharing digital versions of non-digital documents created during the course of an archaeological investigation

item.title: arkhe
item.description: A Collection of R S4 Classes that Represent Archaeological Data

item.title: era
item.description: R package for year-based time scales

item.title: inclusions
item.description: Shortcodes to describe inclusions in ceramic bodies

item.title: nonekXML
item.description: Exchange data format (XML) for NoNeK (Nordmitteleurop√§ische Neolithische Keramik).

item.title: NRHP_Metadata_Scheme
item.description: Metadata scheme for National Register of Historic Places, transcribed from the National Park Service NPS Bulletin 16

item.title: poseidon-framework
item.description: Poseidon is a framework that seeks to provide standardized ways to store and share archaeogenetic, and perhaps more broadly, molecular archaeological datasets.

item.title: rppsfs
item.description: Roman Peasant Project Small Finds Ontology

item.title: The Southwestern Taphonomic Protocol
item.description: A set of analyses to control for variable taphonomic impacts on archaeological faunal datasets
